issue.title: [Java] Prepare new protoc-gen-grpc-java for s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17101](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17101). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Recent s390x build for Java causes [failures](https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/576822591#L2933) due to missing relevant version of protoc-gen-grpc-java.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17101?focusedCommentId=17568268) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13632
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13632>
